snippet: Five days after the former military ruler Pervez Musharraf was taken to a hospital, the panel began to debate whether he could be excused from attending treason proceedings.
abstract: Special court panel examines medical report on former Pakistani military ruler Pervez Musharraf to determine whether he may be excused from attending treason proceedings against him; Musharraf was rushed to military hospital for sudden heart problem on Jan 3; deliberations raise speculation that deal to allow him to leave country may be underway.
lead_paragraph: Five days after the former military ruler Pervez Musharraf was taken to a hospital, the panel began to debate whether he could be excused from attending treason proceedings.

headline.main: Pakistani Court Panel Weighs if Musharraf Is Fit for Trial
headline.print_headline: Court Panel Discusses if Musharraf Is Fit for Trial
